lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Skylar Grey/Elliot Taylor
[00:00.689] 作词 : Skylar Grey/Elliot Taylor
[00:02.068] Born on the wrong side of the ocean
[00:07.935] With all the tides against you
[00:14.285] You never thought you'd be much good for anyone
[00:19.969] But that's so far from the truth
[00:25.736] I know there's pain in your heart
[00:29.220] And you're covered in scars
[00:33.552] Wish you could see what I do
[00:38.175] 'Cause baby, everything you want
[00:43.702] Is everything I need
[00:46.786] You're everything to me
[00:51.252] Baby, every single part
[00:56.519] Is who you're meant to be
[00:59.718] 'Cause you were meant for me
[01:02.938] And you're everything I need
[01:11.985] You can say I'm wrong
[01:14.519] You can turn your back against me
[01:18.152] But I'm here to stay
[01:21.835] (I'm here to stay)
[01:24.769] Like the sea
[01:27.019] Should keep kissing the shoreline
[01:30.951] No matter how many times he pushes her away
[01:36.136] 'Cause baby, everything you want
[01:41.319] Is everything I need
[01:44.369] You're everything to me
[01:48.769] Baby, every single part
[01:53.902] Is who you're meant to be
[01:57.119] 'Cause you were meant for me
[02:02.202] And everything happens for a reason
[02:08.236] It's started passing in the skies
[02:15.319] I used to question who I was
[02:20.603] When now I see
[02:23.802] The answer's in your heart
[02:27.339] 'Cause baby, everything you want
[02:32.485] Is everything I need
[02:35.487] You're everything to me
[02:40.019] Baby, every single part
[02:45.202] Is who you're meant to be
[02:48.326] 'Cause you were meant for me
[02:51.436] And you're everything I need
tlyric:
[by:咆哮的小清新___]
[00:02.068]生在海的逆流一端
[00:07.935]潮汐日夜向你侵袭
[00:14.285]你从未想过自己对他人有何种非凡意义
[00:19.969]但这真实一面此刻却难以企及
[00:25.736]我明白你内心的伤痛
[00:29.220]知道你满身彪炳的伤痕
[00:33.552]多么希望你能明白我的用心
[00:38.175]你所渴望的一切
[00:43.702]亦是我无比渴求的迫切
[00:46.786]你于我而言就是一切
[00:51.252]宝贝 每一部分每一面的你
[00:56.519]都是你与生俱来的注定
[00:59.718]因为你就是我的注定
[01:02.938]你是我渴望的全部意义
[01:11.985]你可以说一切都是我错
[01:14.519]你可以转过身去留我独自沉默
[01:18.152]但我还会留在原地
[01:21.835]我不会离去
[01:24.769]就像海洋
[01:27.019]始终会奔向拥吻着海滨
[01:30.951]无论海滨多少次对它漠然远离
[01:36.136]你所渴望的一切
[01:41.319]亦是我无比渴求的迫切
[01:44.369]你于我而言就是一切
[01:48.769]宝贝 每一部分每一面的你
[01:53.902]都是你与生俱来的注定
[01:57.119]因为你就是我的注定
[02:02.202]一切的发生自有其原因
[02:08.236]那份注定自天空降临传递
[02:15.319]我曾无数次怀疑迷失过我自己
[02:20.603]而今我终于看清
[02:23.802]一切的答案就在你心底
[02:27.339]你所渴望的一切
[02:32.485]亦是我无比渴求的迫切
[02:35.487]你于我而言就是一切
[02:40.019]宝贝 每一部分每一面的你
[02:45.202]都是你与生俱来的注定
[02:48.326]因为你就是我的注定
[02:51.436]你就是我渴望的全部意义
